resources.string: To make an emergency call during setup, press the \"Menu\" key.
You will need a MOTOBLUR account to use essential services on your phone as well as the MOTOBLUR Internet portal.

"Let's create your new account:
Please enter your full name."
Your name is used to store your contact information in the device phonebook.
Enter the address of one of your existing email accounts. This will become your MOTOBLUR accountID.
MOTOBLUR uses this address to send you important service information. Motorola will not share this address or send spam email.
Create a password for your new MOTOBLUR account.
You will use the password along with the email address whenever you need to log into your MOTOBLUR account.
Please write down your MOTOBLUR ID and your password and keep it in a safe place for future reference.

Please review the MOTOBLUR Terms and Conditions by tapping the link above. By selecting I agree checkbox, you agree to the terms of the MOTOBLUR Software License Agreement, Terms of Service and Privacy Statement. You must agree to these terms in order to use this service.
You are about to connect to MOTOBLUR. This service allows you to access and manage a variety of content.

Please review the Motorola Mobile Services Terms and Conditions by tapping the link above. By selecting the \"I agree\" checkbox, you agree to the terms of the Motorola Mobile Services Software License Agreement, Terms of Service and Privacy Statement. You must agree to these terms in order to use this service.
Motorola Service End User License Agreement
"You are about to connect to Motorola Mobile Services. This service allows you to access and manage a variety of online services. "
Your MOTOBLUR account has been created successfully
"Now let's set up your new phone to access your email, contacts, photo and social networking sites."
If you use any of the services below, tap the icon to set it up or long press the icon for more details
If you use any of the services below, tap the icon to set it up.
You can only have one active {0} account at a time. Would you like to remove the existing account?
Would you like to remove the {0} account?
Only one account for {0} can be added.
You can only have one active {0} service account at a time.
In order to send and receive emails with Gmail, synchronize your Google Contacts or download applications from Android Market, please sign back into your Google account.
In order to send and receive emails with Google Mail, synchronize your Google Contacts or download applications from Android Market, please sign backinto your Google account.
To change your MOTOBLUR ID, please enter your password.
Please call customer service to retrieve your password.

"Please make sure that your new MOTOBLUR ID is an email account that you have access to.
MOTOBLUR uses this address to send you a confirmation email which you will need to verify your account. Motorola will not share this address or send spam emails."

"Your MOTOBLUR ID does not match your current password. This happens if you change your password on the MOTOBLUR portal, but not the device. Please update your phone with the new password you entered in the MOTOBLUR portal."
Your MOTOBLUR ID was successfully changed to:

"Your password has not changed.
The MOTOBLUR service sent a confirmation email to above address. "
" Within the next 24 hours, please open the email and follow the instructions to confirm your MOTOBLUR account."

"Your MOTOBLUR password was successfully updated.
Please make sure to write down your new password and keep it in a safe place along with your MOTOBLUR ID for future reference."
After you created your MOTOBLUR account the service sent you a confirmation email to your account address:

"This email contains a link that you need to click in order to verify your account. Please open the email and follow the instructions to complete the account verification.
If you cannot access the above email address, please click \"Change MOTOBLUR ID\" to enter a new account name with an email address that you have access to."
If the address is correct but you have not received the email, please click \"Resend email\".

"Now you can catch all of your friends' {0} updates in the Social Networking app.
The Social Networking app brings together updates, uploaded photos, friend requests, and more from all of the major networks into a single app!
Add a Social Networking widget to the Home Screen to see {0} updates from all of your friends -- or just the inner circle. "

"Access your {0} Inbox in the universal Messaging app. New messages appear in your inbox automatically.
The Motorola Messaging widget also shows the latest unread text messages, emails, and social networking messages all together in a single stream - or you can pick and choose accounts."

"Access your {0} Inbox in the universal Messaging app. New emails appear in your inbox automatically.
The Motorola Messaging widget also shows the latest unread text messages, emails, and social networking messages all together in a single stream - or you can pick and choose accounts."

"Now you can easily share photos with family and friends using your {0} account.
Whether you're snapping new pictures with the Camera or enjoying them in the Picture Gallery, uploading photos to {0} is a breeze."

"With a {0} account, your contacts, calendar and emails are wirelessly synchronized with this device. You can choose to sync all three types of data or any combination.
Access your {0} Inbox in the universal Messaging app. New emails appear in your inbox automatically.
The Motorola Messaging widget also shows the latest unread text messages, emails, and social networking messages all together in a single stream - or you can pick and choose accounts."

"You can start using your device right away. It may take up to 30 minutes to download all of your account data, which may include contacts, calendar events, status updates, and more.
If you installed any applications from Android Market™, please re-install them from there. Please use the same username password you used to purchase them and there will be no charge to your account."

"You can start using your device right away. It may take up to 30 minutes to download all of your account data, which may include contacts, calendar events, status updates, and more.
We recommend that you go to Location & security and set a security lock for this phone."
Privacy policies for use of Google and Android services can be found under Settings/About Phone/Legal Information/Google legal.
Are you sure you want to remove this account? (%1$s-%2$s)
Your Blur account will automatically feed your friends latest profile pictures and status into every call, message and contact.
Oops. The username and password you entered is not working.
"Google's location service provides applications with your approximate location without using GPS. You can disable these features in Settings, under Location & Security."
"Allow Google's location service to collect anonymous location data. Collection will occur even when no applications are running."
Use My Location for Google search results and other Google services.
{0} has been set as the source of your contact pictures.
{0} is the source of your contact pictures. Would you like {1} to be the new source of your contact pictures?
"Email address must be properly formed. Please provide an email address where we can reach you. "For example, "user@domain.com "
This account has already been added.
There was an error creating your account. Please try again.
A password reset link has been sent to your email address
SMTP port cannot be blank (SMTP is usually 25)
Incoming port cannot be blank (POP is usually 110 and IMAP is usually 143)
Remove manually deleted emails from the server
To verify your log-in please enter the text into the field below
The account name must be unique, please try another name.
There was an error saving your account information, please try again.
The certificate from the server is not validated. Do you want to disable verifying certificates for this account? (Not Recommended).
The certificate from the server is not validated.
Could not connect to the server.
Login to the account failed, please try again.
"The device cannot be provisioned on this server. Please contact the server's admin."
"The device does not support this server version. Please contact the server's admin."
The account was disabled on the Blur service
The account does not exist on the Blur service
The account already exists on the Blur service. Please choose a different account id.
Your phone already has an account associated with it.
The connection timed out, please try again.
An error has occurred. Please try again.
Your username or password is incorrect. Please check them and try again.
Your entry is invalid, please try again.
An internal server error occurred. Please try again
The server had no response. Check to make sure the service is working and try again.
Your request was denied, please try again.
The request required user credentials, but they were not provided in the request.
Incorrect current password. Please try again.
The phone radio is unable to connect to the network. Make sure the radio is on or if it is on, move into better coverage area and try again.
Unable to connect at this time, try again later.
The request timed out waiting for a response. The account may have been incorrectly created
You have tried to reset your password too many times today. Please try again later.
The Blur service indicated your request was unauthorized. Check to make sure the Blur service is working.
An unknown error occurred, please try again.
This account is being used by another device. This device must be erased before this account can be used.
"Your ID and/or Password were not recognized. Please verify and try again. If you forgot your password click the 'Forgot Password' button to have it sent to you by email."
The authentication has expired. Please try again.
There is a problem with the clock on the device. Please contact customer service.
There was an error retrieving information.
There were errors getting data from the Blur service.
Motorola Service TERMS AND CONDITIONS content text
Internet data connection needed to view Terms and Conditions
If you uncheck this checkbox, we will not verify the certificate from the server for this account. Are you sure you want to do this?
Please enter your password again for verification
"Your phone number must only contain digits, '-' or '+'"
The server address should be correctly formatted.
{0} must not be more than {1} characters.
You have removed all the services for this account, this will remove the account, do you want to continue?
{0} username or password incorrect. If you recently changed your password please re-enter the new password now.
The service is unable to automatically set up this account
Automatic set up is not available for your email provider. Please manually set up email account.
Please enter your email address to reset your password
"Please select a connection type to finish setup"

" MOTOBLUR is a FREE service that makes your device come alive by delivering social network updates, news, messages and more to your phone.
It also gives you access to the MOTOBLUR portal where you can:
- Locate your phone - Erase the content on your phone when it is lost or stolen
Skipping MOTOBLUR setup will disable these features."
is not available without a social account. To create a new account, click Setup
is not available without a Blur account. To create a new account or log into an existing one, click Setup

"Connection failed! In order to complete set up you need a data connection.
Please press the \"Retry\" button when you get back into network coverage."
You can elect to save even more data by setting email accounts to only sync while connected to a WLAN network
"SIM card is removed or changed. Log in to your MOTOBLUR account to unlock."
Please enter your MOTOBLUR account and password to log in
To fully integrate {0} into your mobile experience, click Add Account.
Use this account type to setup your work e-mail, contacts and calendar with MOTOBLUR.
Use this account type to include your Hotmail, Gmail, Yahoo!, POP3, IMAP, or other e-mail accounts in your Universal Inbox.
Use this account type to include your Hotmail, Google Mail, Yahoo!, POP3, IMAP, or other e-mail accounts in your Universal Inbox.
If you routinely upload photos to {0} and would like to do so easily, click Add Account.
To fully integrate {0} into your mobile experience, click Add Account.
Sign in with your Google credentials to get access to Google Mail, Google Contacts, Google Calendar, The Market, PicassaWeb, and other other Google services.

" MOTOBLUR is a free service that makes your device come alive by connecting you to your friends in social networks, sending you the latest news and keeping your contacts list up to date.
It also gives you access to the MOTOBLUR portal where you can:
- Locate your phone - Remotely erase the content of your phone if it is lost or stolen
Press \"Setup\" to begin setting up your MOTOBLUR account. "
"Don't forget to make a note of your Motorola Service ID!"
You will need this information if you ever lock yourself out of the device.
Loading an existing MOTOBLUR account will remove all Email accounts from your device and replace them with the accounts stored in your MOTOBLUR profile.

"\"System update\" is not available without a Motorola service account.
Would you like to setup an account now?"
"\"{0}\" is not available without a social networking account. To create a new account or log into an existing one, click \"Setup\" button"
"\"{0}\" is not available without a social networking account. To create a new account, click \"Setup\" button."

"In order to complete setup, you need a data connection.
You have the following choices:"
This is taking longer than expected
We will continue to try in the background.
Please enter the server name manually.
The default quick upload account for pictures is not setup. Would you like to setup the default quick upload account now and continue this upload?
The default quick upload account for videos is not setup. Would you like to setup the default quick upload account now and continue this upload?
This upload will be queued for transfer when WLAN becomes available. To upload immediately, go to settings to disable data saver.
%1$s will be queued for upload when WLAN becomes available. Check progress in the notification window.
Please choose a service for your upload
Uploading over the network may take longer than using a WLAN network.
The phone settings will be adapted to the data plan you have subscribed.
In order to complete setup you need a data connection.You have the following Choices:

"The %1$s is more like a computer than a phone, with many features, such as software updates, GPS ephemeris updates, weather forecasts, email, chat software, and many more, that will require data costs. In order to ensure that you get the most out of your phone, we recommend that you apply for a data package from your network service provider. If you applied for a time based data package, you may want to set your %1$s to \"default data network\" to temporarily disable the data features and avoid unnecessary costs when you aren't using the data services"
